field.name: typdoc
field.label: msg:type_doc_sort
field.sql: select typdoc from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'

field.name: tit1
field.label: msg:237
field.sql: select tit1 from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 200 and usubfield="a" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: tit2
field.label: msg:238
field.sql: select tit2 from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 200 and usubfield="c" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: tit3
field.label: msg:239
field.sql: select tit3 from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 200 and usubfield="d" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: tit4
field.label: msg:240
field.sql: select tit4 from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 200 and usubfield="e" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: f_tparent_id
field.label: msg:241
field.sql: select tparent_id from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 200 and usubfield="i" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: tnvol
field.label: msg:242
field.sql: select tnvol from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 200 and usubfield="h" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: aut0_id
field.label: msg:244
field.sql: select author_id from authors,responsability where responsability_author = author_id and responsability_type = '0' and responsability_notice = '!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select group_concat(value SEPARATOR ", ") from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where (ufield = 700 or ufield = 710) and (usubfield="a" or usubfield = "b") and recid = !!id!! group by ufield

field.name: f0_code
field.label: msg:245
field.sql: select responsability_fonction from authors,responsability where responsability_author = author_id and responsability_type = '0' and responsability_notice = '!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where (ufield = 700 or ufield = 710) and usubfield="4" and recid = !!id!! group by ufield

field.name: aut1_id0
field.label: msg:246
field.sql: select author_id from authors,responsability where responsability_author = author_id and responsability_type = '1' and responsability_notice = '!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select group_concat(value SEPARATOR ", ") from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where (ufield = 701 or ufield=711) and (usubfield="a" or usubfield = "b") and recid = !!id!! group by ufield

field.name: f1_code
field.label: msg:245
field.sql: select responsability_fonction from authors,responsability where responsability_author = author_id and responsability_type = '1' and responsability_notice = '!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where (ufield = 701 or ufield=711) and usubfield="4" and recid = !!id!! group by ufield

field.name: aut2_id0
field.label: msg:247
field.sql: select author_id from authors,responsability where responsability_author = author_id and responsability_type = '2' and responsability_notice = '!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select group_concat(value SEPARATOR ", ") from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where (ufield = 702 or ufield=712) and (usubfield="a" or usubfield = "b") and recid = !!id!! group by ufield

field.name: f2_code
field.label: msg:245
field.sql: select responsability_fonction from authors,responsability where responsability_author = author_id and responsability_type = '2' and responsability_notice = '!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where (ufield = 702 or ufield=712) and usubfield="4" and recid = !!id!! group by ufield

field.name: ed1_id
field.label: msg:164
field.sql: select ed1_id from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 210 and usubfield="c" and recid = !!id!! order by subfield_order

field.name: coll_id
field.label: msg:250
field.sql: select coll_id from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 410 and usubfield="t" and recid = !!id!! union select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 225 and usubfield="a" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: nocoll
field.label: msg:253
field.sql: select nocoll from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 410 and usubfield="v" and recid = !!id!! union select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 225 and usubfield="v" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: subcoll_id
field.label: msg:251
field.sql: select subcoll_id from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 411 and usubfield="t" and recid = !!id!! union select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 225 and usubfield="i" and recid = !!id!!

field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 210 and usubfield="c" and recid = !!id!! order by subfield_order desc

field.name: cb

field.sql: select code from notices where notice_id ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 010 and usubfield="a" and recid = !!id!! union select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 011 and usubfield="a" and recid = !!id!!

field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield = 330 and usubfield="a" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: num_noeud
field.label: msg:134
field.sql: select num_noeud from notices_categories where notcateg_notice ='!!id!!'
field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where ufield like '60%' and usubfield="a" and recid = !!id!!

field.name: indexint

field.sql_ext: select value from entrepot_source_!!source_id!! where (ufield = 676 or ufield = 686) and usubfield="a" and recid = !!id!!
